name: Cat and Zombies Demo
description:
If you run this game in browser for the first time, just run it and then refresh windows and run again,because first time runing, there is some problem with sound.

Press W to break resources.

a/s move left right, space - jump

Walk to the weapon and left click to pick up them

Press on compass right down  for options and map.

play a game for min. 5 minutes if you want to see something

This is demo I didnt made it on time :/

All credis > Pixabay.com

Levels going faster in this version
